title: California State Portal
cleaned_text: as of July 2015 5th Largest Economy in the World 65+ Million annual visitors 19+ Million civilians in Labor Force Disaster Resources California has been hit with devastating wildfires and other natural disasters in both the northern and southern parts of the state. If you need more information about recovery or resources visit the following resources: [Emergency Services](https://news.caloes.ca.gov/2021-wildfires/) [Wild Fire Recovery](http://wildfirerecovery.org/) [Disaster Assistance](https://www.disasterassistance.gov/) believes in the power of unlocking government data.
